data.name: Hidden Object - Sweet Home
data.detailed_description:
Can you find all the hidden objects in your home?

Help the beautiful woman find all lost objects in her home in this finding object game.

There's no time limit to search and you can use a hint to find the tools that you need to complete each chapter.

Help the pretty woman find objects in his day, she became confused with so many things to do in her home.

You can do zoom in and zoom out to have a better look in all scenes. Slide your finger to move the screen to make your search easier.

There's a lot of missing gadgets in different environments, like the kitchen, backyard, living room, bedroom, and kids' room. There's no better place than a clean home, locate everything that is lost in your house.

If you like hidden object games, download now this game and enter this day to day adventure.

Features

- Easy to play
- Zoom feature - zoom in and zoom out
- No time limit
- This game is available in English, French, and Russian

data.short_description: Help a pretty woman search for lost objects in this hidden object game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS 10.9
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
linux_requirements.recommended:
